history.subject: Internships similar to MSFT Explore :: CS Undergrad

history.content:
Hey, second-year CS undergrad here. Haven't done an internship since beginning college yet and really liked MSFT's Explore Program: suited for people with less experience (taken Java in HS and Python in first-year university, good for learning, and my opinion great intro for anyone in first/second year in this kind of position.

Looking for similar types of internships at other companies anyone may know about (doesn't have to be big name company). Some names I've heard: Google STEP, TwitterUniversity, FacebookUniversity.

I've thought about middle-ground tech companies as well that seem interesting companies as a whole: DoorDash, Tinder, Uber, Airbnb, Netflix.

Any help here appreciated- to summarize, looking for internships similar to MSFT Explore. Thanks!
history.subject: Internships similar to MSFT Explore :: CS Undergrad
